anecdotes.content: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
anecdotes.author: Steve Jobs

anecdotes.content: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
anecdotes.author: Steve Jobs

anecdotes.content: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.
anecdotes.author: Bruce Lee

anecdotes.content: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
anecdotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

anecdotes.content: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
anecdotes.author: Seneca

anecdotes.content: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
anecdotes.author: Seneca
